verses.verse: To the chief Musician, <WH5329> Maschil, <WH4905> A Psalm of David, <WH1732> when Doeg <WH1673> the Edomite <WH130> came <WH935> and told <WH5046> Saul, <WH7586> and said <WH559> unto him, David <WH1732> is come <WH935> to <WH413> the house <WH1004> of Ahimelech. <WH288> Why <WH4100> boastest thou thyself <WH1984> in mischief, <WH7451> O mighty man? <WH1368> the goodness <WH2617> of God <WH410> endureth continually. <WH3605> <WH3117>
Thy tongue <WH3956> deviseth <WH2803> mischiefs; <WH1942> like a sharp <WH3913> razor, <WH8593> working <WH6213> deceitfully. <WH7423>
Thou lovest <WH157> evil <WH7451> more than good; <WH4480> <WH2896> and lying <WH8267> rather than to speak <WH4480> <WH1696> righteousness. <WH6664> Selah. <WH5542>
Thou lovest <WH157> all <WH3605> devouring <WH1105> words, <WH1697> O thou deceitful <WH4820> tongue. <WH3956>

God <WH410> shall likewise <WH1571> destroy <WH5422> thee forever, <WH5331> he shall take thee away, <WH2846> and pluck thee out <WH5255> of thy dwelling place, <WH4480> <WH168> and root <WH8327> thee out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of the living. <WH2416> Selah. <WH5542>
The righteous <WH6662> also shall see, <WH7200> and fear, <WH3372> and shall laugh <WH7832> at <WH5921> him:

Lo, <WH2009> this is the man <WH1397> that made <WH7760> not <WH3808> God <WH430> his strength; <WH4581> but trusted <WH982> in the abundance <WH7230> of his riches, <WH6239> and strengthened <WH5810> himself in his wickedness. <WH1942>
But I <WH589> am like a green <WH7488> olive tree <WH2132> in the house <WH1004> of God: <WH430> I trust <WH982> in the mercy <WH2617> of God <WH430> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5703>

I will praise <WH3034> thee forever, <WH5769> because <WH3588> thou hast done <WH6213> it: and I will wait on <WH6960> thy name; <WH8034> for <WH3588> it is good <WH2896> before <WH5048> thy saints. <WH2623>
